messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Homeschool Learning Cruise's
messages.msgSnippet: I let this post go through because with tweaks in language it could sound just as unschooling. Sounds like funshops on bits from the geographical area, and
messages.messageBody:
I let this post go through because with tweaks in language it could
sound just as unschooling.

Sounds like funshops on bits from the geographical area, and could be
good for an unschooling family. So don't take it apart. It's not
spam. I had a request in advance.

-=-Your children will be provided with not only a fun trip with all the
amenities aboard Royal Caribbean's Explorer of the Seas, but an
educational experience that will provide the basis for studies for years
to come! � -=-




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Homeschool Learning Cruise's
messages.msgSnippet: Our next learning Cruise: Homeschool Bermuda Learning Cruise 2007 Leaving from Bayonne New Jersey Other Dates and Itineraries Available
messages.messageBody:
Our next learning Cruise: Homeschool Bermuda Learning Cruise 2007
Leaving from Bayonne New Jersey
Other Dates and Itineraries Available www.HomeschoolontheSeas.com
<http://www.homeschoolontheseas.com/> Where Children Learn, Have Fun
& Parents Vacation ALL FOR ONE GREAT PRICE!!! 5 Nights, September
9-14, 2007 Onboard Royal Caribbean's "Explorer of the Seas"
Departing Cape Liberty in Bayonne , New Jersey Get Ready to Sail! 
Your children will be provided with not only a fun trip with all the
amenities aboard Royal Caribbean's Explorer of the Seas, but an
educational experience that will provide the basis for studies for years
to come!  Bermuda INTERACTIVE lessons structured to your child's
age group, in Science, History and Current Events. Topics include:
Bermuda 's ecology, threats to ecology, colonization, political climate,
government structure, economy, and culture.  Learners and their
families can attend group classes, complete independent study projects,
and small group projects.  Upon arriving at the port of Bermuda ,
families will have the opportunity to complete the "HotS Quest",
a memorable adventure for the whole family. "Homeschool on the Seas"
Learning Cruises Many Dates and Itineraries Available
www.HomeschoolontheSeas.com <http://www.homeschoolontheseas.com/>


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
